attributes.action: Award of the South Atlantic Medal(Without Rosette) to HMS Ledbury/HMS Brecon/RMS St Helena
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To respectfully ask the Prime Minister to award the South Atlantic Medal(Without Rosette) to HMS Ledbury, HMS Brecon and RMS St Helena for their contribution to the Falklands Conflict in 1982

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Ministry of Defence.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
